channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Header Images
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Header Images

item.title: CVE-2021-24798|2024-08-03T19:42:17.188Z -- unknown -- wp%20header%20images
item.description: The WP Header Images WordPress plugin before 2.0.1 does not sanitise and escape the t parameter before outputting it back in the plugin's settings page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
